label: Questionable search
description: This article was imported as a result of a search, but the article appears to be out of scope and the search criteria may have been too broad.

label: Borderline initial review
description: This was examined in initial review but no judgment made.  It was a borderline case.  Look at it again later.

label: Borderline board manager review
description: This was examined by a board manager but no judgment made.  It was a borderline case.  Look at it again later.  A specific topic must be identified.

label: Import fast track
description: The article was imported as part of a fast track import process.  A specific topic must be identified.

label: Import special search
description: The article was imported as part of a special search import process.  A specific topic must be identified.

label: Legacy conversion note
description: Information about the article recorded during conversion from the legacy CiteMS

label: Added by Board Manager
description: Used when board managers assign a new board and topic to an article

label: Core journals search
description: The article was imported as part of a core journals search. A specific topic must be identified.

label: Not reviewed
description: The article has been waiting for review with no activity for at least two years.

label: High priority
description: The article needs expedited review by the board (for example, because it has been provided by the EIC or another channel or in the press).
